description:
Netflix is expected to update its global Top 10 TV shows list on top10.netflix.com on Tuesday, January 20, 2026, 3:00 PM ET, reflecting viewership from the previous week (Monday to Sunday).

This market will resolve based on which show this update ranks as the #2 global Netflix show.

The ranking is based on total views globally, as reported by Netflix for TV shows (English only).

If the top10.netflix.com update does not occur by January 23, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Other".
